website_summaries.verdict: A pretty, well-made vase for a reasonable price. If you love Waterford but don't want to spend a premium price, check out this beauty.
pros: A gorgeous piece from the more affordable line by Waterford that's made of lead-free crystalline
cons: Customers have complained about the gift box the vase is packaged in being damaged upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: It is very beautifully crafted.
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and beautiful, my only disappointment is, I thought it was bigger. Plus I also bought the Submersible lights going to get my flowers now😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Criscia Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vase
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and looks elegant on the table. Very heavy crystal! Used as a centerpiece for a wedding table. Great gift to give the bride and I know it will be used often!
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a wedding gift for a friend. Such a classy gift. It’s so heavy and beautiful! Ok, I got jealous and then bought one for myself. It’s always on my table with fresh flowers. I love it! Looks $$$$$. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Superfly_cat1111

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crystal vase
customer_reviews.text: This vase was a wedding gift. It is really beautiful. Heavy crystal. Perfect size for a medium bouquet. The wedding hasn’t taken place yet so I assume the bride will like the gift. I would!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: I knew this vase would be beautiful but I had no idea how heavy it was. Stunning piece!
customer_reviews.author: G. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good vase and quality
customer_reviews.text: love it!I even doubt the glass quality after seeing so many reviews. It is cristal and stunning really like it
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: For your home or as a gift a fine selection
customer_reviews.text: There are vases which can cost thousands of dollars ... for the money, this is a fine, heavy weight, piece of German glasswork. Whether something from your garden, or a bunch picked up on the way home, or designed by a floriest, they'll all shine in this very fine piece.
customer_reviews.author: JacksonK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the Marquis decanter and 2 glasses as well as a Marquis decorative bowl. All sit on my bar cart and they look fantastic. It’s a well known brand name and no one has to know it’s the Marquis version. Looks much more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: RobD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to display some gold dipped roses. They are beautiful and are hefty so they’re not cheaply made. I would for sure recommend for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: It's a vase, not bowl.
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a vase instead of a bowl. The main pic is misleading. We ordered a few for gifting but were disappointed on receiving vases instead of bowls. Will return them. The vases are beautiful however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Gifted it to my sister in law and it’s so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Diane S

customer_reviews.title: Atunning
customer_reviews.text: What a stunning vase! It’s on my Kanye and is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE HALL

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Gift
customer_reviews.text: Heavy vase for a good price, we filled it with flowers and gifted it for Mother's day.
customer_reviews.author: customer Good read, buy it.

customer_reviews.title: Not as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed with the vase. It was rather "clunky", small, and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Jo Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Vase
customer_reviews.text: It is a great buy I bought it for an engagement party
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: This vase is a beautiful classy wedding gift. Everyone needs a classic vase that will stand the test of time. The vase is heavy and and crystal catches this light beautifully. Highly recommend this for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Anniversary gift
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful and great quality. Very heavy crystal. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Ebersole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My boss retired and this was a gift to her. She loved it. It was beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cobbs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Crystal Vase
customer_reviews.text: This vase is stunning! I sent it to my mother for Mother's Day in another state. When I went to visit her and saw the actual vase, I was shocked at how lovely it was especially considering the discounted price I paid for it. I was so pleased! I would definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Hall

customer_reviews.title: This vase is one of the most beautiful vases I have seen
customer_reviews.text: This vase is one of the most beautiful vases I have seen. It was in perfect condition when it arrived. I gave this to our friends for their 25th wedding anniversary and they were so pleased with it, they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jack and Jan Cable

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vase
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely gorgeous vase that was a steal on sale. Gave it as a housewarming present and my friends loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, but solid weight and makes flowers look good.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. I got MORE than expected!

customer_reviews.title: Light price for heavy quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality and price of this vase. I got it for half the price that Macy's is selling it for with their store closeout 'clearance'.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful as a gift
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful gift to get for a girlfriend for birthday Christmas

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what the bride and groom will now receive but I will sure enjoy it. Beautiful vase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a wedding gift and decided to keep it for myself! I don't know what the bride and groom will now receive but I will sure enjoy it. Beautiful vase!!

customer_reviews.title: Elegance on a budget
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for the main floral arrangements for an outdoor wedding ceremony. In addition to being elegant, they were heavy enough to handle the sizeable arrangement and not worry about them being toppled. The price made them very affordable.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift for anyone or yourself
customer_reviews.text: Elegance and outstanding! A perfect gift for anyone or yourself!!

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning vase! It's surprisingly heavy and thick, however the cuts sparkle beautifully. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PublicName

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a strong sturdy vase that is elegant and beautiful at the same ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a strong sturdy vase that is elegant and beautiful at the same time. This one answers all the criteria and more. The glass is very thick. The base of it is heavy and assures that the flowers will not tip over with a big bouquet. I love it. It is for my girlfriend and she thought it is gorgeous. It looks great with the flowers you get at Jewel or some such, you know the kind, those with the medium long stems.
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Garnier

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Crystal Vase: Makes a Beautiful Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This will make a beautiful wedding gift! I was in need of a vase for myself, so I ordered two. The pieces sparkle so nicely and with flowers in them they are stunning! This crystal vase is the superb quality that one would expect out of Waterford. The crystal vase is heavy and has weight like crystal of this size should. The etching is beautiful and it will complement any flowers and take them to the next level! You won't be disappointed withis this gorgeous vase. 💐🌹💐
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Montague

customer_reviews.title: Probably Not Fine Crystal
customer_reviews.text: I like this vase for everyday use. If I were shopping for a wedding gift I might look for a finer quality. Heavy enough to pass but lacking the edges and ringing sound of real crystal.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Moo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful vases and since that is their purpose I am happy with them. Waterford to me is overpriced, but these were on sale and I couldn't resist.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the dozen roses that I get from ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the dozen roses that I get from the grocery store. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning vase!
customer_reviews.text: Vase came in the mail today. Much more beautiful in person, and I may add, larger too. Easily could handle a couple dozen roses. Was well packaged and came on time. Very happy on this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Bartoszewicz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love fresh flowers in the house but the vase is just as important. Beautiful vase.
customer_reviews.author: Ogad

customer_reviews.title: Great look and value
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box this vase looks stunning and feels very heavy and durable. I had been looking for a vase big enough to fit multiple dozen flower, and this was finally a good fit. The price and shipping are unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the light reflects off the design pattern. Just the right size for what I need. Has some weight to it, so it feels durable.

customer_reviews.title: perfect

customer_reviews.title: Very nice vase

product_meta.title: Marquis By Waterford Markham Collection 9" vase, 9&quot, Clear Crystalline
product_meta.description: Marquis by Waterford combines versatility with value, using classic Waterford cuts to create crystal of astonishing clarity and substantial weight. The Marquis by Waterford 9 inch Markham Vase is a sparkling piece of beautiful craftsmanship that will make a statement in any home. Perfect as a gift for yourself or for a loved one, the Marquis pattern is stylish and eye catching; displaying deep crystal cutting techniques and a smooth finish. This beautifully shaped Vase is a stylish combination of classic crystal glassware and modern design. The Markham giftware collection offers a classic yet modern style. Sophisticated diagonal cuts on a beautiful shaped 9" Vase combine for the perfect gift or accent piece to any home.
feature_bullets: Perfect for Everyday Use and Entertaining
Weight and Stability of Waterford's Hand-Crafted, Fine Crystal
Presented in the Marquis Gift Box for Any Occasion

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars266 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
